name: overhaul
description: Significantly changes how the game looks

name: meme
description: Isn't intended to be used seriously

name: ambience
description: Adds small changes that make the game feel more realistic

name: gui
description: Overhauls the GUI, might make it compatible with Optifine shaders

name: free-for-all
description: Shaders that are under permissive licences

name: abuse
description: Changes the core of the game in some way

name: potato
description: Has close to zero effect on the performance

name: low-end
description: Affects the performance, but not by much

name: medium-end
description: Causes a noticeable decrease in performance
